# Unicode.GeneralCategory.titlecaseLetter

**Case**

A digraph character whose first part is uppercase.

## Declaration

```swift
case titlecaseLetter
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Titlecase_Letter` (abbreviated `Lt`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.titlecaseLetter
